apiDesc.p: Container of RSubConnection parameter sets.
For each Parameter Type (Requested, Acceptable and Granted) it contains one generic and 0..N extended parameter sets.

Note: a CSubConParameterBundle or RSubConParameterBundle object can take ownership of a CSubConParameterFamily object, in this case, when the bundle is destroyed, this family object will also be destroyed (along with any parameter sets that are owned by the family).
THIS API IS DEPRECATED IN FAVOUR OF RParameterFamily
since v9.6

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: static IMPORT_C CSubConParameterFamily * NewL(RSubConParameterBundle &aBundle, TUint32 aFamilyId)

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Family container (bundle) that this family is to be added to

identifier for the specific family type, currently only 4, QoS (KSubConQoSFamily),Authorisation (KSubConAuthorisationFamily), CallDescrParams (KSubConnCallDescrParamsFamily) and ContextDescrParams (KSubConnContextDescrParamsFamily), are defined.

apiDesc.p: Creates a new sub-connection parameter set family. This class is used as a container for a number of parameter sets (generic and extension) that make up a family. It is a specific instantiatable class and therefore creates an instance of CSubConParameterFamily without using ECOM.

Note: The aBundle parameter that is passed into this method will take ownership of the newly created CSubConParameterFamily object. When the bundle is destroyed, this family object will also be destroyed (along with any parameter sets that are owned by the family).
a pointer to a sub-connection parameter family if successful, otherwise leaves with system error code.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Family container (bundle) that this family is to be added to
Buffer containing the serialised object information

apiDesc.p: Creates a new sub-connection parameter set family from a buffer containing the serialised object.

Note: The aBundle parameter that is passed into this method will take ownership of the newly created CSubConParameterFamily object. When the bundle is destroyed, this family object will also be destroyed (along with any parameter sets that are owned by the family).
a pointer to a sub-connection parameter family if successful, otherwise leaves with system error code.

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: static IMPORT_C CSubConParameterFamily * NewL(CSubConParameterBundle &aBundle, TUint32 aFamilyId)

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Family container (bundle) that this family is to be added to.

identifier for the specific family type, currently only 4, QoS (KSubConQoSFamily),Authorisation (KSubConAuthorisationFamily), CallDescrParams (KSubConnCallDescrParamsFamily) and ContextDescrParams (KSubConnContextDescrParamsFamily), are defined.

apiDesc.p: Creates a new sub-connection parameter set family. This class is used as a container for a number of parameter sets (generic and extension) that make up a family. It is a specific instantiatable class and therefore creates an instance of CSubConParameterFamily without using ECOM.

Note: The aBundle parameter that is passed into this method will take ownership of the newly created CSubConParameterFamily object. When the bundle is destroyed, this family object will also be destroyed (along with any parameter sets that are owned by the family).
a pointer to a sub-connection parameter family if successful, otherwise leaves with system error code.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Family container (bundle) that this family is to be added to
Buffer containing the serialised object information

apiDesc.p: Creates a new sub-connection parameter set family from a buffer containing the serialised object.

Note: The aBundle parameter that is passed into this method will take ownership of the newly created CSubConParameterFamily object. When the bundle is destroyed, this family object will also be destroyed (along with any parameter sets that are owned by the family).
a pointer to a sub-connection parameter family if successful, otherwise leaves with system error code.
Sub-connection parameter family destructor. It cleans up the arrays deleting all the paarmeter sets it ownes

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Generic Parameter Set to be assigned to the family (family takes ownership)
The type of the set (requested, acceptable or granted)

apiDesc.p: Assigns the generic parameter set of a sub-connection parameter set family.

Note: The CSubConParameterFamily object takes ownership of the parameter set that is passed into this method. When the family object is destroyed, any parameter sets owned by this object will also be destroyed.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Extension Parameter Set to be added to the family (family takes ownership)
The type of the set (requested, acceptable or granted)

apiDesc.p: Adds an extension parameter set to a sub-connection parameter set family.

Note: The CSubConParameterFamily object takes ownership of the parameter set that is passed into this method. When the family object is destroyed, any parameter sets owned by this object will also be destroyed.

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: IMPORT_C CSubConExtensionParameterSet * FindExtensionSet(TUid aSetId, TParameterSetType aType)

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Although a TUid, this is the extension class Id
The type of the set from TParameterSetType (ERequested, EAcceptable or EGranted)

apiDesc.p: Searches a sub-connection parameter family for an extension parameter set. DO NOT USE this form of the method. It is broken. This is only capable of finding extension sets contained within IP Subconnection Provider, and these extension sets have been deprecated.
Pointer to the extension set if found, otherwise a NULL pointer.

cxxFunctionDefinition.cxxFunctionPrototype: IMPORT_C CSubConExtensionParameterSet * FindExtensionSet(STypeId aSetId, TParameterSetType aType)

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: The STypeId of the extension set
The type of the set from TParameterSetType (ERequested, EAcceptable or EGranted)

apiDesc.p: Searches a sub-connection parameter family for an extension parameter set. Pointer to the extension set if found, otherwise a NULL pointer.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: The type of the set (requested, acceptable or granted)

apiDesc.p: Accessor for the sub-connection generic parameter set of a family.
Pointer to the generic set if set, otherwise a NULL pointer.
Fetch the identity of the sub-connection parameter family
Calculates the length of buffer required to serialise this parameter set family.
Length of buffer required.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Buffer containing the serialised family object

apiDesc.p: Instructs this sub-connection family to set its members based on the serialiesd data in the buffer passed.
KErrNone if successful, otherwise system wide error

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Buffer to append the serialised object to

apiDesc.p: Instructs this sub-connection family to create a serialised version of itself and append it to the buffer that has been passed.
KErrNone if successful, otherwise system wide error (e.g. KErrOverflow if the descriptor is too small) If unsuccessful, there is no guarantee as to the buffer or data stored in it.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: The type of the set to be deleted(requested, acceptable or granted)

apiDesc.p: Clears (removes and deletes) all parameter sets with the type specified

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: RParameterFamily object to copy to

apiDesc.p: Copy the parameters of this CSubConParameterFamily to a RParameterFamily.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: RParameterFamily object to copy from

apiDesc.p: Copy the parameters of this CSubConParameterFamily from a RParameterFamily.

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: identifier for the specific family type, currently only 4, QoS (KSubConQoSFamily),Authorisation (KSubConAuthorisationFamily), CallDescrParams (KSubConnCallDescrParamsFamily) and ContextDescrParams (KSubConnContextDescrParamsFamily), are defined.

apiDesc.p: Empty sub-connection parameter family constructor

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Bundle (container) the family is to be added to

apiDesc.p: Set up the sub-connection family with empty sets

Note: The aBundle parameter that is passed into this method will take ownership of the newly created CSubConParameterFamily object. When the bundle is destroyed, this family object will also be destroyed (along with any parameter sets that are owned by the family).

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Bundle (container) the family is to be added to

apiDesc.p: Set up the sub-connection family with empty sets

Note: The aBundle parameter that is passed into this method will take ownership of the newly created CSubConParameterFamily object. When the bundle is destroyed, this family object will also be destroyed (along with any parameter sets that are owned by the family).

cxxFunctionParameter.apiDefNote: Source buffer containing mulitple serialised objects (family at the start)
Set up by this method and represents only the serialised data of the family object.

apiDesc.p: Used internally to extract the family id for the descriptor storing the serialised version of this object (and others). It also sets up a new buffer that is the section of the original buffer that represents this object only.
the family Id, otherwise leaves with system error code.
